Source code for housemonitor.inputs.test.dataenvelope_test

'''
Created on Dec 14, 2012

@author: Gary
'''
import unittest
import datetime
from inputs.dataenvelope import DataEnvelope
from mock import Mock, MagicMock, patch



[docs]class Test(unittest.TestCase):


[docs]    def test_storing_data(self):
        test = DataEnvelope()
        test.arrival_time.toString = MagicMock()
        test.arrival_time.toString.return_value = '2012/10/03 01:02:03'
        self.assertEqual(test.type, 'xbee')
        self.assertEqual(test.packet, {})
        self.assertEqual(test.arrival_time.toString(), '2012/10/03 01:02:03')
        self.assertEqual(test.data, {})


    @patch('inputs.dataenvelope.GetDateTime.toString')

[docs]    def test_storing_data_using_patch(self, str):
        test = DataEnvelope()
        str.return_value = '2012/10/03 01:02:03'
        self.assertEqual(test.type, 'xbee')
        self.assertEqual(test.packet, {})
        self.assertEqual(test.arrival_time.toString(), '2012/10/03 01:02:03')
        self.assertEqual(test.data, {})


    @patch('inputs.dataenvelope.GetDateTime.__str__')

[docs]    def test_storing_data_using_patch_and___str__(self, s):
        test = DataEnvelope()
        s.return_value = '2012/10/03 01:02:03'
        self.assertEqual(test.type, 'xbee')
        self.assertEqual(test.packet, {})
        self.assertEqual(test.arrival_time.__str__(), '2012/10/03 01:02:03')
        self.assertEqual(test.data, {})


    @patch('inputs.dataenvelope.GetDateTime.__str__')

[docs]    def test_storing_data_using_patch_and___str__1(self, s):
        test = DataEnvelope()
        s.return_value = '2012/10/03 01:02:03'
        self.assertEqual(test.type, 'xbee')
        self.assertEqual(test.packet, {})
        self.assertEqual(str(test.arrival_time), '2012/10/03 01:02:03')
        self.assertEqual(test.data, {})

if __name__ == "__main__":
    # import sys;sys.argv = ['', 'Test.test_storing_data']
    unittest.main()  # pragma: no cover
